x

| 12 | 11 | #P_pttopon | |- ( ( I e. W /\ A. x e. I ( TopOpen ` ( R ` x ) ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) ) -> ( Xt_ ` ( x e. I |-> ( TopOpen ` ( R ` x ) ) ) ) e. ( TopOn ` X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) ) |

| 27 |  | #P_fcompt | |- ( ( TopOpen : _V --> _V /\ R : I --> _V ) -> ( TopOpen o. R ) = ( x e. I |-> ( TopOpen ` ( R ` x ) ) ) ) |
